{"id":537225106,"lang":"cpp","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1628749472,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/537225106/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        if(divisor==1) return dividend;\n        if((divisor==-1 && dividend==(1<<31)))return INT_MAX;\n        if(dividend==0)return 0;\n        int ans=0;\n        bool s=(dividend<=0)==(divisor<=0);\n        dividend=abs(dividend);\n        divisor=abs(divisor);\n        while(dividend>=divisor){\n            int c=1,t=divisor;\n            while((t<<1)<=dividend){\n                t<<=1;\n                c<<=1;\n            }\n            ans+=c;\n            dividend-=t;\n        }\n        return s?ans:-ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers"}
